metadata.title: RPS Studio Dual Speedlite Portable Accessories Kit
features: This kit includes 2 6'6" light stands, 2 light stand umbrella mount flash holders
2 36" combination umbrellas and storage case. The umbrellas can be used
as translucent or white reflective umbrellas. Just add your own flash units
and you have a portable speedlight studio.
description: This kit includes 2 6'6" light stands, 2 light stand umbrella mount flash holders, 2 36" combination umbrellas and storage case. The umbrellas can be used as translucent or white reflective umbrellas. Just add your own flash units and you have a portable speedlight studio.
